home.bio_p1: Computer Science student focusing on Cybersecurity, including offensive security, networks, and Linux. I have solid knowledge in languages like C, C++, and JavaScript, along with experience in vulnerability exploration, reverse engineering, and malware development.
home.bio_p2: I am currently deepening my studies in reverse engineering, malware development, and analysis. I have been working with tools like IDA Pro and studying Command and Control (C2) and frameworks like Cobalt Strike.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Introduction
about.bio: Computer Science student at Universidade Veiga de Almeida, focusing on cybersecurity, offensive security, reverse engineering, and malware development. Solid knowledge in C, C++, and JavaScript.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies I have worked with or had contact with in an academic environment or personal projects.

terminal.bio:
Hi, my name is Matheus.
I'm 18 years old and I created this blog to document my studies.
I still consider myself a beginner in malware development and analysis.
I enjoy developing them mainly in C/C++.
